p: The interday precision of the marker compounds were <5.0% (relative standard deviation, RSD value) with accuracies of 90.46–104.65%. The interday precisions were <8.7% (RSD value) with accuracies of 87.74–103.67% ( Table S1). The recoveries of the marker compounds ranged from 84.06% to 115.30% with RSD value values of <8.6% ( Table S2). The above-developed method was successfully applied to analyze the 12 marker compounds ( Figure 2 and Figure S1).
